Actions.Name: Intimidate
Actions.Description: The [name] marks a foe outside of range 6. After the marked foe uses an ability, the [name] may rush 2 spaces towards the foe, shoving characters in their path 1 space out of the way. If the marked character starts their turn adjacent to the [name], they take fray damage twice, become stunned and this mark ends.

Actions.Name: Flame Blast
Actions.AreaEffect: Characters take 3 damage twice and are shoved 1 in any direction.
